data.name: Flip TD - Tower Defense
data.detailed_description:
• Flip To Survive
Build on both sides of your world to survive randomly generated waves of enemies and unique bosses. Reach the target wave and continue on in endless mode to reach new hi-scores


  • Custom Content
Create an endless number of custom worlds, play through the included levels, or enjoy those created and shared by others.

  • Upgrade, Unlock, Improve. Defend.
Unlock new towers and upgrade them with boons to improve their stats. Improve attack towers with nearby buff towers and create devastating effects

  • Wreak Havoc
Cast down powers on invaders to deal massive damage with meteors, lightning strikes, overcharges, and more..

data.short_description: Flip Tower Defense on it's head in Flip TD. Flip your world upside down to defend with towers, upgrades, modifiers, powers, and more. Build custom worlds with the in-game world builder and share them online to compete for high scores in the community leaderboards.
